mapper.select: select ocd.client_id clientId, ocd.resource_ids resourceIds, ocd.client_secret clientSecret, ocd.scope scope, ocd.authorized_grant_types authorizedGrantTypes, ocd.web_server_redirect_uri webServerRedirectUri, ocd.authorities authorities, ocd.access_token_validity accessTokenValidity, ocd.refresh_token_validity refreshTokenValidity, ocd.create_time createTime, ocd.archived archived, ocd.trusted trusted, ocd.autoapprove autoapprove, ocd.redirect_url redirectUrl, ocd.img_url imgUrl, ocd.status status, ocd.client_type clientType, ocd.client_name clientName, ocd.client_domain clientDomain, ocd.is_del isDel from user_client uc INNER JOIN oauth_client_details ocd on(ocd.client_id = uc.client_id) INNER JOIN tp_main_admin_user au on(au.id = uc.user_id) where uc.user_id = #{userId} and au.user_type = 1
SELECT uc.user_id userId FROM user_client uc WHERE uc.client_id = #{clientId}
